data.name: Project Hunter
data.detailed_description:
Stealth and tactic game that give you the control of an alien that evolves, acquire new abilities and face levels in various ways.

  • Control An Alien That Eats Humans.
  • Sneak Up and Murder Your Enemies Brutally.
  • Evolve to become the apex predator of your environment.
  • Add new skills to your set that Will allow you to Hunt and advance in various ways.
  • Survive in a hostile environment.

Abilities

You will have different abilities depending on your evolve stage

Dash: this ability will make you able to do a fast move forward, so you can evade your enemies easier.

Spit: this ability will make you able to mislead your enemies to the place you want.

Invisible: this ability will make you invisible for a limited time, but be careful you may be detected by some enemy security items!


And more abilities that you will learn along the way !

Remember to Add Us to Your Wishlist!

data.short_description: Stealth and tactic game that give you the control of an alien that evolves, adquire new abilities and face levels in various ways.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX950
  • Storage: 3.5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 / AMD Athlon X4 740
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1050
  • Storage: 3.5 GB available space
